attributes.action: Abolish the censorship of everyday words just because they could be related to a person's condition, skin colour or ehtnic minority
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: What i mean by this is words like 'black board' as used in school. Why should i not have the right to say this word just because it could be though to have a relation with a person's skin colour? when it quite obviously does not?. As well as this the word 'Brainstorm', because is could relate to epilepsy. These are signs of the nanny state britain going out of control and it needs to stop immediately unless we want to live in a world where we are all frightened of what we say.

rejection.details: There is no legislation censoring the use of these terms.
reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
